results.description: Read the 12 takeaways from this weekend's Scottish Premiership action.
results.title: Scottish Premiership: What did we learn from the weekend's games?

results.description: Hamilton were held to a 2-2 draw by 10-men Kilmarnock but one positive to come from the game was this incredible long-range goal from forward Mickel Miller.
results.title: Watch: Miller nets long-range thriller for Hamilton

results.description: Despite an early red card, Hamilton hold on for more than an hour to take a point from Kilmarnock. (UK only)
results.title: Highlights: Kilmarnock 2-2 Hamilton Academical

results.description: Hamilton Accies let a two-goal lead slip at Kilmarnock after Sam Stubbs' red card but held on to secure a point.
results.title: Kilmarnock 2-2 Hamilton Academical: Ten-man Accies hold Kilmarnock

results.description: Catch up with all the team news and stats for the six games taking place before the international break, and choose your preferred XI.
results.title: Scottish Premiership team news, stats & selectors

results.description: Brian Graham's late goal ensures Hamilton Academical and Ross County have to share the points. (UK only)
results.title: Highlights: Hamilton Academical 2-2 Ross County

results.description: Hamilton Academical head coach Brian Rice believes his side deserved all three points against Ross County after they conceded late to draw 2-2.
results.shortTitle: Watch: 'Total injustice' Hamilton didn't win - Rice
results.title: Brian Rice: 'Total injustice' Hamilton didn't beat Ross County

results.description: Ross County edge into the top six of the Scottish Premiership after Brian Graham's late strike rescued a draw against Hamilton Academical.
results.title: Hamilton Acad 2-2 Ross County: Visitors rescue late draw

thumbnail.altText: Brian Graham celebrates his late equaliser

results.description: Lewis Ferguson fires in the only goal as Aberdeen dominate for long spells at Hamilton Accies.
results.title: Highlights: Hamilton 0-1 Aberdeen

results.description: Aberdeen put their weekend thrashing by Celtic behind them with a 1-0 Scottish Premiership win at Hamilton Academical.
results.shortTitle: Aberdeen get back to winning ways at Hamilton
results.title: Hamilton 0-1 Aberdeen: Dons move on from Celtic thrashing

results.description: Bottom-of-the-table St Johnstone earn a much-needed win over Hamilton Academical. (UK only)
results.title: Highlights: St Johnstone 3-2 Hamilton Academical

results.description: St Johnstone's winless start to the Scottish Premiership season was finally halted with a dramatic 3-2 victory over Hamilton Academical.
results.title: St Johnstone 3-2 Hamilton Academical: Hosts end wait for Premiership win

results.description: Ross Cunningham's second-half penalty earns Hamilton Academical a point at home to Hibernian. (UK only)
results.title: Highlights: Hamilton Academical 1-1 Hibernian

results.description: Hibernian remain without a Scottish Premiership victory since the opening day after Ross Cunningham's second-half penalty earned Hamilton a point.
results.title: Hamilton Academical 1-1 Hibernian: Visitors without league win since opening day
